titles.title: NATO Special Immigrant Amendments of 1995
To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for special immigrant status for NATO civilian employees in the same manner as for employees of international organizations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 1/30/1995--Introduced. NATO Special Immigrant Amendments of 1995 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide special immigrant status for certain NATO civilian employees.
